hero.title: Social Impact.
hero.subtitle: We build trust on the social impact you are already making.

host-hero.title: Host your projects on ComGo ü§≤
host-hero.subtitle: Our mission is to generate trust to all legally constituted social organizations who wish to manage their projects with efficiency and transparency towards their donors

project.title: Your project
project.subtitle: Host your project on ComGo
project.paragraph: Host your projects on our platform to offer donors traceability on their contributions. Transparency, efficiency and responsibility.

corporate-donors-hero.title: Manage your donations with ComGo üåç
corporate-donors-hero.subtitle: We want to generate trust among all actors involved in the support and management of social projects and common good activities, where private and institutional donors are key

why.title: Towards full transparency
why.paragraph: We dream of an ecosystem where NGOs and social entities are able to show the heart of their work to achieve citizen's empathy and accomplish their mission. By communicating the social impact they create they can increase trust and collaboration. We at ComGo share their mission and want to take part to create a better world.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.paragraph: ComGo helps donors and collaborators participate of the day to day development of the projects they support.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.paragraph: Our platform encourages responsible donations offering the necessary information and traceability for each project.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.paragraph: At ComGo we dream of a social sector that optimizes 100% of the resources to accomplish the mission of a better world.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: The world's first Blockchain platform for charity project management.
projects.paragraph: At ComGo we know the most important thing is not the percentage of donation that reaches the project, but the immediate and long term social impact that each donation generates. That's why we have created the first blockchain immutable social impact traceability platform.
projects.your-project-subtitle: Host your social projects in ComGo
projects.your-project-content: If you are a social organization, host your projects in our platform to offer your donors a way to follow their contributions. Transparency, efficiency and responsibility

items.title: Installation of a madical gas system in Djunang hospital
items.content: Installation of system of a medical gas system to supply the surgery room of Saint Dominique de Djunang Hospital in Cameroon

items.title: Education support against school dropouts and child labor
items.content: We work to stop absenteeism and school dropouts ‚Äì especially among girls ‚Äì in families at risk and vulnerability in Haryana, India, helping avoid child labor and beggary

items.title: Grace Humanitas School
items.content: We work to promote universal access to basic quality education, with a holistic support system for students, improving infrastructure and school materials, and building a relationship with their families

items.title: More for Mothers
items.content: A project to empower young mothers that feel alone in the full-time care of their children, offering babysitting services so they can invest their time in evolving professionally

items.title: Work First
items.content: #HomelessEntrepreneur helps the homeless integrate into the workforce by generating jobs that are compatible with their 12 month support and training programs

what.title: A digital ecosystem for the common good
what.subtitle: ComGo is the social impact management platform built on Hyperledger on top of IBM Blockchain.

management.title: Social project management
management.paragraph: A digital ecosystem to help organizations manage their social projects in the most transparent, efficient way possible

measurement.title: Measurement of impact
measurement.paragraph: So that each donor can see in real time the impact their donations are generating in the real world

auditing.title: Transparent auditing
auditing.paragraph: A ecosystem of trust, where any party can audit the movement of funds within projects and organizations

action.title: A platform for everyone
action.paragraph: We want to use blockchain to change the way donations are made and traced. Discover how in our whitepaper.

donations.title: Donors
donations.subtitle: Open for everyone
donations.paragraph: Learn the real impact of your donations and follow the development of the projects you support.

corporate.title: Corporate donors
corporate.subtitle: Established companies
corporate.paragraph: Help your company become transparent. ComGo offers a new way of understanding CSR.

ngos.title: Social Organization
ngos.subtitle: Established NGOs
ngos.paragraph: At ComGO we have built a tool to help make your organization more transparent, efficient and impactful.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle:
We love to listen. Questions? Suggestions?

Whatever your doubt may be, we are here to help.

form.name: Name
form.message-placeholder: Your message. Leave no thoughts out!

host-contact.title: Contact us
host-contact.subtitle: If you want your organization be part of our platform please fill in the following form and we will get back to you soon!

form.name: Name
form.message-placeholder: Your message. Leave no thoughts out!

corporate-donors-contact.title: Contact us
corporate-donors-contact.subtitle: If you are an institutional donor, CSR department, foundation, family office or public administration, and you want to manage your donations to projects, calls for proposals, and manage and trace your projects efficiently and transparently throughout all the supply chain, please get in touch. We want to work with you!
